jp.pay.android

クラス Payjp

  • jp.pay.android.Payjp

  • public class Payjp

    Entry point for payjp-android

    • フィールドの詳細

      • INSTANCE

        public static Payjp INSTANCE

        Entry point for payjp-android

    • メソッドの詳細

      • init

        public Payjp init(java.lang.String publicKey)

        Initialize with publicKey.

        パラメータ:
        publicKey - public API Key. You must NOT use secret key.

      • init

        public Payjp init(PayjpConfiguration configuration)

        Initialize with configuration.

        パラメータ:
        configuration - configuration for class Payjp

      • token

        public NonExistentClass token()

        Return interface PayjpTokenService instance. You must call Payjp.init(configuration) first.

        関連項目:
        interface PayjpTokenService

      • cardForm

        public PayjpCardForm cardForm()

        Return class PayjpCardForm instance. You must call Payjp.init(configuration) first.

        関連項目:
        class PayjpCardForm

      • verifier

        public PayjpVerifier verifier()

        Return class PayjpVerifier instance. You must call Payjp.init(configuration) first.

        関連項目:
        class PayjpVerifier
